roleset.name: adapt for older technology
roleset.note: RETROFIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'retrofit' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from retrofit.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: The test project -- which reportedly survived Tuesday's earthquake -- was a prelude to a state plan [*] to retrofit that critical section of the freeway with the steel casings.
example.arg: that critical section of the freeway

example.name: usually just transitive
example.text: ``The reason is that the technology is such that we-2're not able [*-2] to retrofit multi-column structures,'' he said.
